cards.message: The mountains teach us that true strength comes from standing firm through every storm while remaining open to the light that breaks through the clouds.
cards.title: Mountain Wisdom

cards.message: Your body is your temple. Honor it with movement, nourish it with care, and listen to its wisdom.
cards.title: Body Temple

cards.message: Every challenge is an opportunity in disguise. Embrace the difficulty and discover your hidden strength.
cards.title: Hidden Strength

cards.message: True leadership begins with leading yourself. Be the example you wish to see in the world.
cards.title: Lead by Example

cards.message: Life is too important to be taken seriously all the time. Find joy in the absurd and wisdom in laughter.
cards.title: Lighthearted Wisdom

cards.message: Every sunrise brings infinite possibilities. Today is a blank canvas waiting for your unique masterpiece.
cards.title: Infinite Canvas

cards.message: Knowledge is power, but wisdom is knowing how to use that power with compassion and understanding.
cards.title: Wisdom Over Knowledge
